How To: Confirm Successful Installation

  1. Confirm that the profiler binaries have been installed properly. If the default install location is used, then
    • For Windows:
      • sprofile.exe exists under PROGRAMFILES(X86)/AMD/AMD APP Profiler/x86/ and PROGRAMFILES(X86)/AMD/AMD APP Profiler/x64/
    • For Linux:
      • sprofile exists under $AMDAPPSDKROOT/Tools/AMDAPPProfiler-x.x/x86/ and $AMDAPPSDKROOT/Tools/AMDAPPProfiler-x.x/x86_64/
  2. For Windows, to confirm that the Visual Studio plugin has been installed successfully:
    a) Start Microsoft Visual Studio.
    b) Click on Help -> About Microsoft Visual Studio from the Visual Studio main menubar.
    c) Under the Installed products:, you should find AMD APP Profiler x.x.
    If the product is not listed, please run the following command from the command line prompt (with "Run as Administrator" option):
    • For 64-bit OS: C:\Program Files (x86)\Microsoft Visual Studio 9.0\Common7\IDE\devenv.exe /setup
    • For 32-bit OS: C:\Program Files\Microsoft Visual Studio 9.0\Common7\IDE\devenv.exe /setup
      For Microsoft Visual Studio 2010, replace the Microsoft Visual Studio 9.0 text with Microsoft Visual Studio 10.0 for the above command.
